__e: The old capital is far from here.
Things in the Old Capital are just as our grandfather, Genghis, would have them.
Thanks to them, the capital is safer now than it has ever been.
What is the capital of New York?
I've been in the capital a month.
So I got right up in his face and I asked him what the capital of Thailand was and he said, "What?" and I said "Bangkok," then I kicked him in the nuts.
